rocky.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: covered with rocks or made of rock
rocky.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: They hurried over the rough rocky ground.
rocky.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a relationship or situation that is rocky is difficult and may not continue or be successful
rocky.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Rangers got off to a rocky start this season.
The company faces a rocky road ahead.
rocky.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: ( 1976) the first of a series of films in which Sylvester Stallone appears as a determined boxer called Rocky. Four more films, called Rocky II, Rocky III etc, were made about the same character.
